articles.title: New Samsung 980 SSD improves on 970 EVO, EVO Plus performance - Ars Technica
articles.description: Samsung's ever-shifting consumer branding drops "EVO" suffix entirely this time.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ The fastest storage you'll never see: NVMe drives generally get hidden beneath an aluminum heat sink. In our test rig, that heat sink is also underneath its RTX 2070 Super GPU.
